Summary: It was a large green orb with a green aura.
divs: sighting details1. i was south-west of comanche, oklahoma. i was going home after my 8th grade middle school choir concert. 2. i was looking outside the car window, and i saw it. 3. i thought it was a meteor. 4. it was a large green orb. it was about 2x the size of what the sun looks like from earth. it had a green\yellow aura around it as it flew across the sky. 5. i was struck in awe when i first saw it. 6. the object quickly shot over my car and into the distance of the southern part of the night sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Comanche
This sighting has never been favorited.
